parts.Label: Property
parts.Description: Represents a column/field in a table

parts.Label: Composite Key First
parts.Description: First component of a composite primary key

parts.Label: Composite Key Second
parts.Description: Second component of a composite primary key

parts.Label: Parent Key
parts.Description: Hierarchical reference to parent record in same table

parts.Label: Value Set
parts.Description: Represents an enumeration or controlled vocabulary

parts.Label: Value Set Member
parts.Description: Individual value within a value set

parts.Label: View Column
parts.Description: Represents a column in a database view

parts.Label: Comments
parts.Description: Stores any additional textual comments, notes, or observations related to a specific measured value

parts.Label: Contact
parts.Description: Stores detailed personal and professional information for people involved in projects (e.g., name, affiliation, function, e-mail, phone)

parts.Label: Equipment
parts.Description: Stores information about a specific, physical piece of equipment (e.g., serial number, owner, purchase date, storage location)

parts.Label: Equipment Model
parts.Description: Stores detailed, non-redundant specifications for a specific sensor or instrument model (e.g., manufacturer, functions, method)

parts.Label: Equipment Model Has Parameter
parts.Description: Links equipment models to the parameters they can measure

parts.Label: Equipment Model Has Procedures
parts.Description: Links equipment models to the relevant maintenance procedures

parts.Label: Hydrological Characteristics
parts.Description: Stores the hydrological land use percentages (e.g., forest, wetlands, cropland, grassland) within the watershed

parts.Label: Metadata
parts.Description: Contains a list of all existing unique metadata combinations (represented by a series of foreign keys/IDs) that describe a single measurement

parts.Label: Parameter
parts.Description: Stores the different water quality or quantity parameters that are measured (e.g., pH, TSS, N-components)

parts.Label: Parameter Has Procedures
parts.Description: Links parameters to the relevant measurement procedures

parts.Label: Procedures
parts.Description: Stores details for different measurement procedures (e.g., calibration, validation, standard operating procedures, ISO methods)

parts.Label: Project
parts.Description: Stores descriptive information about the research or monitoring project for which the data was collected

parts.Label: Project Has Contact
parts.Description: Links projects to the personnel involved in them

parts.Label: Project Has Equipment
parts.Description: Links projects to the specific equipment used within them

parts.Label: Project Has Sampling Points
parts.Description: Links projects to the sampling points used within them

parts.Label: Purpose
parts.Description: Stores information about the aim of the measurement (e.g., on-line measurement, laboratory analysis, calibration, validation, cleaning)

parts.Label: Sampling Points
parts.Description: Stores the identification, specific geographical coordinates (Latitude/Longitude/GPS), and description of a particular spot where a sample or measurement is taken

parts.Label: Site
parts.Description: Stores general site information, including address, site type, and a link to the associated watershed

parts.Label: Unit
parts.Description: Stores the SI units of measurement (or other relevant units) corresponding to the parameters (e.g., mg/L, g/L, s)

parts.Label: Urban Characteristics
parts.Description: Stores the urban land use percentages (e.g., commercial, residential, green spaces) within the watershed

parts.Label: Value
parts.Description: Stores each measured water quality or quantity value, its time stamp, replicate identification, and the link to its specific metadata set

parts.Label: Watershed
parts.Description: Stores general information about the watershed area, including surface area, concentration time, and impervious surface percentage

parts.Label: Weather Condition
parts.Description: Stores descriptive information about the prevailing weather conditions when the measurement was taken (e.g., dry weather, wet weather, snow melt)

parts.Label: Agricultural
parts.Description: Percentage [%] of agricultural land use. For example farm land

parts.Label: Comment
parts.Description: Comment on the data in the Value table

parts.Label: Comment ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Commercial
parts.Description: Percentage [%] of commercial areas. For example stores or bank areas

parts.Label: Condition ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Equipment Model
parts.Description: Name of the equipment model. For example: ammo::lyser

parts.Label: Equipment Model ID
parts.Description: Link to the Equipment model table

parts.Label: Function
parts.Description: More detailed description about the functions

parts.Label: Functions
parts.Description: Description of the functions of the equipment

parts.Label: Impervious Surface
parts.Description: Percentage of the impervious surface of the watershed in percentage [%]

parts.Label: Industrial
parts.Description: Percentage [%] of industrial areas. For example factories

parts.Label: Institutional
parts.Description: Percentage [%] of institutional areas. For example schools, police stations or city hall

parts.Label: Manual Location
parts.Description: Location where the manual is stored

parts.Label: Metadata ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Number Of Experiment
parts.Description: Number of replica of an experiment

parts.Label: Owner
parts.Description: Name of the owner of the equipment

parts.Label: Procedure Type
parts.Description: Type of the procedure. For example, SOP

parts.Label: Purchase Date
parts.Description: Date when the equipment was bought: 'YYYY-MM-DD

parts.Label: Purpose
parts.Description: Purpose of the data collection. For example, "Measurement", "Lab_analysis", "Calibration" and "Cleaning"

parts.Label: Purpose ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Recreational
parts.Description: Percentage [%] of recreational areas. For example parks or sport fields

parts.Label: Residential
parts.Description: Percentage [%] of residential areas. For example houses or apartment buildings

parts.Label: Sampling Location
parts.Description: Where the sample was taken. For example: "Biofiltration", "Sewer 01" or "Retention Tank"

parts.Label: Sampling Point
parts.Description: Where the sample was taken. For example: "Inlet", "Outlet" or "Upstream"

parts.Label: Site ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Status
parts.Description: Status of the person. For example: "Master student", "Postdoc" or "Intern"

parts.Label: Timestamp
parts.Description: Unix timestamp combining date and time of collected data

parts.Label: Unit ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Value ID
parts.Description: A unique ID is generated automatically by MySQL

parts.Label: Website
parts.Description: Website URL of the contact or organization
